Marketing struggles?  Sales slumping?I solve this!I work with my clients to create a super-charged marketing plan that speaks directly to the pain that their audience feels, so they can be viewed as the elite problem solver in their niche.  I do this by helping my clients understand the true value of their products and services, and positioning them properly in the marketplace for maximum value exposure.  This draws the correct clients to you like moths to a flame light, and repels the wrong clients like kryptonite, so you never feel stuck again and you can work to your true strength and vision all while helping others achieve greatness.If you have been searching for the right way to launch your company, feel like you have been struggling for too long, or just want a fresh set of eyes on your project let's chat!

Selling hardware and software solutions to new and assigned accounts.Responding to RFP and RFQ from top accounts. Fortune 500, Federal Govt, and VAR partners.Collaborate with Engineering, PM, Executive Team to deliver custom solutions.SalesForce.com client management and sales forecasting.

Boosted revenue over 400% in 2013.Built and established entire sales funnel and strategic marketing plan from start-up phase. Designed training curriculum for marketing and technical proficiencies.Heavy outbound calling to acquire and cultivate 150+ new partner relationships.Deep dive into psychological persuasion and conversion techniques.

Yearly Sales Volume over $1.2MM, with at least 120% increases every year.Recognized as Top 5 sales performer in department for four consecutive years.Heavy inbound phone sales, over 100 calls per day in fast-paced technical call center.Honored with “Rock Star Awards” for outstanding sales performance in 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012.Partnered with development team to streamline interface on CRM/billing software.Crushed quota by over 175% across entire tenure.

summary: Do you know how it can be tough for new businesses and entrepreneurs to obtain business loans or lines of credit?I fix this!I make it easy to obtain quick funds that will be in your “LLC” or “Inc” name so that you can start building business credit. Typical funded amount is around $50-85K.  We do this everyday. Sometimes more.  Sometimes a lot more. But initial expectation should be in the $50K+ range.   t takes about 3-5 business days to start receiving your initial round of funding.  Application takes 5-10 minutes, and no income docs required.Call me for ZERO OBLIGATION chat and no sales pitch.  Just facts and we move at your pace.  I look forward to helping you win.602-703-1130
